column4: is there anyway of automatically cleaning all the .config folders for the things i have uninstalled...they seem to remain there
is that like a bug...cos its really silly

by default no user-specific data is removed in the uninstallation process, that's just a rule in *nix I think, and very unlikely to change, suggestions are to add options to either apt or another program to abe able to do this, but they are only suggestions afaik.
